m_DescList: Negative numbers are represented using the symbol <color=#AB2800>-</color>.
For example, using the regular expression <color=#AB2800>-</color> to match <color=#3c3cff>-1</color> results in:
Now, the goal is to match negative numbers.
In this test, the decimal numbers to be matched have the following characteristics:
<color=#3c3cff>\d</color>   One or more repeated Arabic numerals
Please construct a regular expression that passes all the tests on the right side.
